name: PM Kisan Samman Nidhi
description: Financial benefit of ₹6000 per year to farmers
eligibility_criteria: Must be a farmer with cultivable land. Income limit: ₹2 lakh per annum
benefits: ₹2000 every 4 months directly to bank account

name: Ayushman Bharat
description: Health insurance cover of ₹5 lakh per family per year
eligibility_criteria: SECC 2011 database families. Income limit: ₹1.2 lakh in rural, ₹1.8 lakh in urban

name: Sukanya Samriddhi Yojana
description: Savings scheme for girl child education and marriage
eligibility_criteria: Girl child below 10 years, resident Indian

name: Pradhan Mantri Awas Yojana
eligibility_criteria: EWS/LIG families with annual income up to ₹6 lakh
benefits: Subsidy up to ₹2.67 lakh on home loans

name: PM Mudra Yojana
description: Loans up to ₹10 lakh for small businesses
benefits: Collateral-free loans under Shishu, Kishor, Tarun categories
